p: The global GC-MS analysis of CSAO oil revealed the presence of trans-anethole (a phenylpropanoid), accounting for 14.84 % of the total lipid content, as well as saturated (28.22 %) and unsaturated (56.94 %) fatty acids ( Table 1). It has been shown that a high relative level of trans-anethole provides an indication of I. verum authenticity [ 10]. Trans-anethole is known as a popular flavoring substance of commercial value [ 11].
